lines.text: If you get it on tape, you could get it in cash.
If you hear a crash, it could be cash.

[In the T'was the night before Christmas theme]
T'was two nights before Christmas and all through the yard, Mother was hitting lightpoles and hitting them hard.
You may think this is funny but it *snot*.

[Repeated line]
Keep those camera safely rolling.
Close the curtain, lock the door, the squeamish should look away. It's time for the Naughty File.
